mama mehema hamuwimak saha wenwimak dakka 2006 switsarlanthedi...pirimi lamaya eejipthuwe, gahanu lamaya meksikan....habayi ee dennage wadipurama thiyenna aththe lingikathwayata naburu wuna sambandhayak...pita ratawala samulu waladi oya wage dewal dakina eka samanya deyak...mokada labena nidahas asimanthika nisa...anith eka wideshikayo thamange hangim prakasha karanna deparak nohithana nisa...ee wagema unta eka rakata dekakata aadara sambandhatha athi karagena hondata huru nisa...hariyata nikam aasa hithena menu ekak kamathi resturant ekin kala, hondata rasa windala, ra wela gedara giya wage thamayi...

2016.02.16 wana dina payagala, karandagahawaththa pradeshaye padinchikaruweku wisin dushana mardhana kamitu lekam karyalaya wetha idiripath kara athi mema paminilla magin, hitapu sabhapathiwaraya saha ohuge sahodaraya wana kosala sirimanna samaga marga sanwardhana adhikariyata amudrawya sapayimedi wyaja bilpath idiripath karamin rupiyal miliyana 250kata adhika mudalak ayatha lesa upaya gena athi bawata karunu anawaranata karagena thibe.

ada apa sakachcha karanne asata siduwana anathuru pilibandawaya.

namuth ee thathwaya giliheminuyi thiyenne.
hasi ee dawas wala ibbath ekka eka set eke hitapu hondama yaluwek.
bas nawaththana kada thamayi lankawe thiyana apaya samana sakkili kada.///
